parameters.name: ContactGroupIds
parameters.description: The ID of the alert contact group. You can query multiple alert contact groups at a time. Separate multiple group IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: ContactGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the alert contact group.

parameters.name: ContactId
parameters.description: The ID of the alert contact. You can call the SearchAlertContact operation to query the contact IDs. For more information, see [SearchAlertContact](~~130703~~).

parameters.name: ContactName
parameters.description: The name of the alert contact.

parameters.name: IsDetail
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return all alert contacts in the queried alert contact group. By default, not all alert contacts are returned.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region. Default value: `cn-hangzhou`.
